localize.text: There is a Blank Page. Now it is blank, but you could write something inside this.
Record about the present.(Gain two Combat Page reward of this chapter.)
Think about the future.(Gain one Combat Page reward of next chapter.)
End(Gain two Canard Combat Page reward.)
End(Gain one Urban Myth Combat Page reward.)

A man with an eyepatch and a devilish grin strides up to you. "Hey there, stranger. Interested in advancing science? I can make you stronger than any training or blessing. You're gonna need it if you're one of those heroes with a death wish." "Whad'ya say?"
Become test Subject(Change one librarian's every Combat Page into this chapter's random Combat Page.)
Ingest Mutagens(Give one librarian a special Passive.)
"Excellent." The man hands over a dangerous looking syringe filled with a glowing liquid before skulking off into a shadowy alleyway.

"Superb." The man injects you with three unknown substances and pulls out a notepad. As you begin to feel light-headed, he starts to frantically write down notes. Losing track of time completely, by the time you regain your senses, the shady character has disappeared.
"Marvelous." You quaff the mysterious substance. Immediately, you are invigorated and feel your muscle fibers twitch.
"Got a good lead this time" "......" "No seriously, I have a good feeling about this." "Lend me some cash so I hire a few."
Lend him money (Uses 5Ahn. Do reception of Yun's Office)
Yun gathered up some Fixers with borrowed money and headed to the Library. ...Good luck for him.
You hung up the phone. We already know what his end will be.
You got a request to find a lost cat. It's a simple request, but we all know what will happen if we don't find it by Night.
You canceled the request and paid the penalty.
Current Time - 12:00 You're searching for a cat. It's noon, so there's plenty of time.
Current Time - 15:00 You're searching for a cat. It's still daytime. Let's try harder.
Current Time - 18:00 You're searching for a cat. The sun is setting. You're now slowly getting anxious.
Current Time - 21:00 You're searching for a cat. Now the sun has set.
Current Time - 0:00 You're searching for a cat. The Night in the Backstreets will come soon. Do we have to give up now?
Search(30%. If fail, do reception of Sweepers.)
Current Time - 3:13 The night in the Backstreets Starts. Sweepers are crawling out of the dark. ...Prepare for the combat.
You found the lost cat! The requester paid a small commission to you.

There is a corpse lying in front of your eyes. Judging from the traces of opened guts, it seems that there was something wrong with the Rats trying to do the <color=red>Gut-Harvesting</color=red>. You can just look in the pockets, or if you have the skills, you can even do the unfinished job.
Do rest of the Gut-Harvesting(Consume 1 Gut-Harvesting Combat Page. Get 5~20 Ahn.)
You rummaged through the pockets of the corpse and got some coins. It's brutal, but that's how Backstreets works.
You did Gut-Harvesting and handed it over to Syndicates. It's brutal, but that's how Backstreets works.
End (Consume Gut-Harvesting Combat Page. Get 5~20 Ahn.)

Are you looking for a way to become famous in your city? Just storm into an Office and wreak havoc on it. Probably you'll be the most famous person in the town.
Just in a bad way.
